mapper.select: SELECT b.name as name , a.sys_user_sid as sid , c.team_type as teamType , c.sys_project_id as sysProjectId, c.achievement as achievement FROM sys_user_student a, sys_user b, sys_grading_module c where a.id = c.sys_user_student_id AND a.sys_user_sid = b.sid AND c.sys_project_id = #{id , jdbcType = INTEGER} having c.sys_project_id order by c.achievement desc limit 0,3;
